item.title: Netskope Quick Start Guide
item.description: Disclaimer: Any thoughts or opinions in this article are my own and do not reflect those of Netskope. I am a Netskope SE who worte this guide in his own time to assist Netskope customers. Please lodge a PR on GitHub to correct any mistakes or inaccuracies. The Quick Quick Start There are 2 fundamental steps required to deploy Netskope in your environment: 1. Add users to the platform. This is typically done by integrating with your Identity Service (ie: Azure AD, Okta) using SCIM (API), or synchronizing your on-premise Active Directory using the Directory Importer Tool.
